reviews.text: Pop-corns were soggy as if they'd been there for days. Prices are way too high for a standard cinema: 16 euros (with students discount) for a ticket and a small-size bucket of popcorns. The sound in the hall is too loud. People working there are very nice, but this doesn't compensate the stale popcorns.

Please be aware to go there. The cinema screen is the smallest one I ever seen in my live and got only about 67 seat on Screen 8 so imagine how small the room it was beside the seats and really tiny and old fashion. Really disappointed!

Horrible theatre. We went there last week for the movie ponniyin selvan - 2 , and they played the 2nd portion of the movie first. Can you believe any theatre in the world doing that ? They had one job. Really spoilt the entire experience for us. I've been waiting for this movie for so many months and they do this. Gosh. Its a terrible terrible mistake, and they can never undo it for us.

Salle 5 is very small and we could hear the sound of the other movies inside. I think they need to improve and make the halls sound proof.
Aside that, it was pretty easy and comfy.
Very small cinema! Expensive for the size of the screens and the rooms!!! If it brought it's prices down to reflect the experience, it would be better! ALSO NO PARKING....AT ALL!!!!
